Song.title: Hark! The Herald Angels Sing
Song.copyright: By Charles Wesley and Felix Mendelssohn Public domain

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [E | B | E/G# | A |]
Verse 1: [E]Hark! The [C#m]herald [A]angels [B7]sing: [E/G#]“Glory [A]to the [E]new[B7]born [E]King [E]Peace on [C#m]earth, and [A]mercy [F#7]mild, [B7]God and sinners re[F#7]con[B7]ciled!” [G#m]Joyful, [C#m]all ye [A]nations [B7]rise, [G#m]join the [C#m]triumph [A]of the [B7]skies [A]With angelic [F#m]hosts [E/G#]pro[F#m]claim: [B7]“Christ is [E/G#]born in [A]Beth[B7]le[E]hem!” [A]Hark! The herald [F#m]an[E/G#]gels [F#m]sing: [B7]“Glory [E/G#]to the [A]new[B7]born [E]King”[|B |E/G# |A |]
Verse 2: [E]Christ by [C#m]highest [A]heav’n a[B7]dored, [E/G#]Christ the [A]ever[E]las[B7]ting [E]Lord [E]Late in [C#m]time be[A]hold Him [F#7]come, [B7]offspring of the vir[F#7]gin’s [B7]womb [G#m]Veiled in [C#m]flesh the [A]Godhead [B7]see, [G#m]hail the In[C#m]carnate [A]Dei[B7]ty [A]Pleased as man with [F#m]men [E/G#]to [F#m]dwell, [B7]Jesus [E/G#]our Im[A]ma[B7]nu[E]el [A]Hark! The herald [F#m]an[E/G#]gels [F#m]sing: [B7]“Glory [E/G#]to the [A]new[B7]born [E]King”[|B |E/G# |A |]
CHORUS: [E]Glo[C#m]-[F#m]-[B]-[E]-[A]-[B]-ria[B7] [E]In [B]ex-[E]cel-[A]sis [E/B]De-o[B]
Verse 3: [E]Hail the [C#m]heaven born [A]Prince of [B7]Peace! [E/G#]Hail the [A]Son of [E]Right[B7]eous[E]ness [E]Light and [C#m]life to [A]all He [F#7]brings, [B7]risen with healing in [F#7]His [B7]wings [G#m]Mild He [C#m]lays His [A]glory [B7]by, [G#m]born that [C#m]man no [A]more may [B7]die [A]Born to raise the [F#m]sons [E/G#]of [F#m]earth, [B7]born to [E/G#]give them [A]se[B7]cond [E]birth [A]Hark! The herald [F#m]an[E/G#]gels [F#m]sing: [B7]“Glory [E/G#]to the [A]new[B7]born [E]King”[|B |E/G# |A |]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king peace on earth and mercy mild god and sinners reconciled joyful all ye nations rise join the triumph of the skies with angelic hosts proclaim christ is born in bethlehem hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king verse 2 christ by highest heavn adored christ the everlasting lord late in time behold him come offspring of the virgins womb veiled in flesh the godhead see hail the incarnate deity pleased as man with men to dwell jesus our immanuel hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king chorus gloria in excelsis deo verse 3 hail the heaven born prince of peace hail the son of righteousness light and life to all he brings risen with healing in his wings mild he lays his glory by born that man no more may die born to raise the sons of earth born to give them second birth hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king

Arrangement.description: Hark the Herald / Angels We Have Heard Medley
Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [Bb B/A | Gm F/A Bb | C C/Bb F/A | Bb Bb/C F |]
{key:F} Verse 1: [F]Hark! The [Dm]herald [Bb]angels [C7]sing: [F/A]“Glory [Bb]to the [F/C]new[C7]born [F]King [F]Peace on [Dm]earth, and [Bb]mercy [G7]mild, [C]God and [C/E]sinners [G6]re[G/B]con[C]ciled!” [C/Bb] [Am]Joyful, [Dm]all ye [Bb]nations [C7]rise, [Am]join the [Dm]triumph [Bb]of the [C7]skies [Bb]With angelic [Gm]hosts [F/A]pro[Gm]claim: [C7]“Christ is [F/A]born in [Bb]Beth[C7]le[F]hem!” [Bb]Hark! The herald [Gm]an[F/A]gels [Gm]sing: [C7]“Glory [F/A]to the [Bb]new[C7]born [F]King”
{key:F} Verse 2: [F]Christ by [Dm]highest [Bb]heav’n a[C7]dored, [F/A]Christ the [Bb]ever[F/C]las[C7]ting [F]Lord [F]Late in [Dm]time be[Bb]hold Him [G7]come, [C]offspring [C/E]of the [G6]vir[G/B]gin’s [C]womb [C/Bb] [Am]Veiled in [Dm]flesh the [Bb]Godhead [C7]see, [Am]hail the In[Dm]carnate [Bb]Dei[C7]ty [Bb]Pleased as man with [Gm]men [F/A]to [Gm]dwell, [C7]Jesus [F/A]our Im[Bb]ma[C7]nu[F]el [Bb]Hark! The herald [Gm]an[F/A]gels [Gm]sing: [C7]“Glory [F/A]to the [Bb]new[C7]born [F]King”
{key:F} Refrain:
Refrain: Gl[F]o—[Dm]— —[Bb/G]— —[C]— —[F]— —[Bb]— —[Csus]— —[C7]ria [F]In [C]ex[F]cel[Bb]sis [F/C]De—[C]o (repeat)
{key:E} Verse 1: [F]Angels [F/D]we have [F/Bb]heard [Bb]on h[F]igh [F]Sweet[C]ly s[Dm]ing [Bb7/G]o’re [Bb6/C] the pl[F]ains [F]And the [F/D]mountains [F/Bb]in [Bb] rep[F]ly [F]Ech[C]o b[Dm]ack their [Bb7/G]joy [Bb6/C]ous str[F]ains
Refrain: Gl[F]o—[Dm]— —[Bb/G]— —[C]— —[F]— —[Bb]— —[Csus]— —[C7]ria [F]In [C]ex[F]cel[Bb]sis [F/C]De—[C]o (repeat)
{new_page} {key:F} Verse 3: [F]Hail the [Dm]heaven born [Bb]Prince of [C7]Peace! [F/A]Hail the [Bb]Son of [F/C]Right[C7]eous[F]ness [F]Light and [Dm]life to [Bb]all He [G7]brings, [C7]risen with [C/E]healing [G6]in [G/B]His [C]wings [C/Bb] [Am]Mild He [Dm]lays His [Bb]glory [C7]by, [Am]born that [Dm]man no [Bb]more may [C7]die [Bb]Born to raise the [Gm]sons [F/A]of [Gm]earth, [C7]born to [F/A]give them [Bb]se[C7]cond [F]birth [Bb]Hark! The herald [Gm]an[F/A]gels [Gm]sing: [C7]“Glory [F/A]to the [Bb]new[C7]born [F]King”
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king peace on earth and mercy mild god and sinners reconciled joyful all ye nations rise join the triumph of the skies with angelic hosts proclaim christ is born in bethlehem hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king verse 2 christ by highest heavn adored christ the everlasting lord late in time behold him come offspring of the virgins womb veiled in flesh the godhead see hail the incarnate deity pleased as man with men to dwell jesus our immanuel hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king refrain refrain glo ria in excelsis deo repeat verse 1 angels we have heard on high sweetly sing ore the plains and the mountains in reply echo back their joy ous strains refrain glo ria in excelsis deo repeat verse 3 hail the heaven born prince of peace hail the son of righteousness light and life to all he brings risen with healing in his wings mild he lays his glory by born that man no more may die born to raise the sons of earth born to give them second birth hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [E | B | E/G# | A |]
Verse 1: [E]Hark! The herald angels [B7]sing: [E/G#]“Glory [A]to the [E]new[B7]born [E]King [E]Peace on earth, and mercy [F#7]mild, [B7]God and sinners re[F#7]con[B7]ciled!” [G#m]Joyful, [C#m]all ye [A]nations [B7]rise, [G#m]join the [C#m]triumph [A]of the [B7]skies [A]With angelic [F#m]hosts [E/G#]pro[F#m]claim: [B7]“Christ is [E/G#]born in [A]Beth[B7]le[E]hem!” [A]Hark! The herald [F#m]an[E/G#]gels [F#m]sing: [B7]“Glory [E/G#]to the [A]new[B7]born [E]King”[|B |E/G# |A |]
Verse 2: [E]Christ by highest heav’n a[B7]dored, [E/G#]Christ the [A]ever[E]las[B7]ting [E]Lord [E]Late in time behold Him [F#7]come, [B7]offspring of the vir[F#7]gin’s [B7]womb [G#m]Veiled in [C#m]flesh the [A]Godhead [B7]see, [G#m]hail the In[C#m]carnate [A]Dei[B7]ty [A]Pleased as man with [F#m]men [E/G#]to [F#m]dwell, [B7]Jesus [E/G#]our Im[A]ma[B7]nu[E]el [A]Hark! The herald [F#m]an[E/G#]gels [F#m]sing: [B7]“Glory [E/G#]to the [A]new[B7]born [E]King”[|B |E/G# |A |]
CHORUS: [E]Glo[C#m]-[F#m]-[B]-[E]-[A]-[B]-ria[B7] [E]In [B]ex-[E]cel-[A]sis [E/B]De-o[B]
Verse 3: [E]Hail the heaven born Prince of [B7]Peace! [E/G#]Hail the [A]Son of [E]Right[B7]eous[E]ness [E]Light and life to all He [F#7]brings, [B7]risen with healing in [F#7]His [B7]wings [G#m]Mild He [C#m]lays His [A]glory [B7]by, [G#m]born that [C#m]man no [A]more may [B7]die [A]Born to raise the [F#m]sons [E/G#]of [F#m]earth, [B7]born to [E/G#]give them [A]se[B7]cond [E]birth [A]Hark! The herald [F#m]an[E/G#]gels [F#m]sing: [B7]“Glory [E/G#]to the [A]new[B7]born [E]King”[|B |E/G# |A |]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king peace on earth and mercy mild god and sinners reconciled joyful all ye nations rise join the triumph of the skies with angelic hosts proclaim christ is born in bethlehem hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king verse 2 christ by highest heavn adored christ the everlasting lord late in time behold him come offspring of the virgins womb veiled in flesh the godhead see hail the incarnate deity pleased as man with men to dwell jesus our immanuel hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king chorus gloria in excelsis deo verse 3 hail the heaven born prince of peace hail the son of righteousness light and life to all he brings risen with healing in his wings mild he lays his glory by born that man no more may die born to raise the sons of earth born to give them second birth hark the herald angels sing glory to the newborn king
